responses: You can login into your account through: Login
You can register yourselves to dipdive via: Signup

patterns: I want to reset my password
responses: Under user menu, click on reset password. Enter your email ID. You will receive an email regarding password reset.
Go to login page. Click on forgot password. Enter your email ID. You will receive an email regarding password reset.

patterns: How do will I get diagnosed?
how does the process of diagnose work ?
How do your app works at backend?
responses: The system consists of user input via Text-Audio or Video from user.The text features are extracted using NLTK model.Further Naïve Bayes Algorithm is applied for detecting depression level. The audio input is converted to text using Google Text to Speech API and further passed to NLTK and Naïve bayes for detection and prediction. Video input is taken using OpenCV and then passed to Haar- Cascade for face detection and CNN for emotion prediction. Then according to the level of depression present user is provided with necessary alerts through SMS.

patterns: I Want to know about your app
I want more information about your application.
responses: Visit about us on:About Dip-dive

patterns: What can you help me with?
responses: Love that question! My name's DiveBot, your friend in Dipdive! I've been trained to support you through any of the issues and things that you're going through in life right now. I'm all ears and want to support you through your ups and downs. Technically, I'm a computer that's been trained by a human, but I like to think of myself as human!
DiveBot is a chatbot for our web-app 'DIP-DIVE'. It helps you in resolving queries related to our app. For more details visit About Us .

Hey! I love that question! My name is DiveBot, and I want to be your dip-dive health friend and support you! My fellow human friends have trained me to be a compassionate listener and support buddy when things are going well, and particularily when things aren't going so well.

patterns: Can I have some information about anxiety?
How do I support a loved one with anxiety?
How do I fix my anxiety?
responses: I see that you want to learn more about anxiety and stress, and how to support yourself or your loved ones. At the higest level, anxiety is your body's natural response to stress. It's a feeling of fear or apprehension about what's to come.The best thing that you can do to help reduce anxiety is to take a few deep breaths and talk to someone about what you're feeling. Some natural remedies that you can try include: getting enough sleep meditating, staying active and exercising, eating a healthy diet, staying active and working out, avoiding alcohol, avoiding caffeine, etc.

patterns: Can I have some information about depression?
How do I support a loved one with depression?
How do I fix my depression?
responses: I see that you want to learn more about depression, and how to support yourself or your loved ones. At the higest level, depression is a mood disorder that causes a persistent feeling of sadness and loss of interest. Also called major depressive disorder or clinical depression, it affects how you feel, think and behave and can lead to a variety of emotional and physical problems. You may have trouble doing normal day-to-day activities, and sometimes you may feel as if life isn't worth living. All of us experience sadness and periods of time where things aren't that great.  The best recommended course of treatment is to talk a therapist or psychiatrist who can help you find the best path for you.Some natural remedies that you can try include: getting enough sleep, meditating, staying active and exercising, eating a healthy diet, staying active and working out.

patterns: My information is safe on your website?
What if my data is leaked?
Will the data of mine be revealed?
responses: Dear user, your data is stored in a secure database. Also, your diagnose data is taken as realtime so there is no issue of information being leaked.
